name: Empires
description:
Empires is an medieval survival game. It currently only has singleplayer, but multiplayer is planned, but not confirmed. In Empires you will have to survive, whether it be from animals or other elements. Gather materials, craft items, and make a shelter!

Features:

-Base Building
-Gathering
-Crafting
-Day/night cycle
-Animals
-Survival system
-Weather system
-Hunting system
-Large map to explore (infinite terrain)

Planned features:

-Multiplayer
-Tree cutting down animations
-Water Gathering
-Save and load feature
-Enhanced main menu
